alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Southern Carroll; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central York, central Strafford, southeastern Belknap and southeastern Carroll Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alton, or 15 miles southeast of Laconia, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Alfred, Sanford, Barrington, Berwick, Farmington, Lebanon, Alton, Barnstead, Gilmanton, Wolfeboro, Waterboro, Lyman, Acton, Brookfield, Strafford, New Durham, Middleton, Milton and Shapleigh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
